name: Rolling with the Pope
description:
Roll with the pope to escape the vatican on the third day.

Good luck, keep your prayer counter high, who knows what happens if you run out (you lose).

Patch 1.0.0.1:

Clearerish instructions.

You can no longer win the game shortly after loosing it.

Patch v1.0.0.4:

Balance Changes

Patch v1.0.0.5:

Less terrible instructions

Patch v1.0.0.6

Fixed that i accidentally uploaded an installer version.
